accommodations.question: What time is check-in and check-out?
accommodations.answer: Check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability.

accommodations.question: Are pets allowed at CBC?
accommodations.answer: No, pets are not allowed at Coral Beach & Tennis Club to maintain the comfort and safety of all guests.

accommodations.question: Do you offer babysitting services?
accommodations.answer: Yes, professional babysitting services are available and can be arranged through our concierge desk. Advance booking is recommended.

accommodations.question: Is there WiFi available?
accommodations.answer: Yes, complimentary high-speed WiFi is available throughout the property including all accommodations, dining venues, and common areas.

accommodations.question: What is included with my accommodation?
accommodations.answer: All accommodations include daily housekeeping, premium linens, complimentary WiFi, air conditioning, mini-refrigerator, coffee/tea facilities, and luxury toiletries.

dining.question: Do I need reservations for dining?
dining.answer: Reservations are recommended for all dining venues, especially during peak season. You can make reservations through the concierge or by calling the restaurant directly.

dining.question: What are the dress codes for dining venues?
dining.answer: Dress codes vary by venue: Main Dining Room requires smart casual to elegant attire, Beach Terrace is casual, Members' Bar is smart casual, and Beach Bar is resort casual.

dining.question: Can you accommodate dietary restrictions?
dining.answer: Yes, our chefs can accommodate most dietary restrictions including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and specific allergies. Please inform us when making reservations.

dining.question: Is room service available?
dining.answer: Yes, room service is available for accommodation guests. Menus and hours vary by season - contact the front desk for current information.

facilities.question: Is there a gym or fitness center?
facilities.answer: Yes, our modern fitness center is open daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM and features cardio equipment, weights, and offers yoga classes.

facilities.question: Can I reserve tennis courts?
facilities.answer: Yes, tennis court reservations can be made through the concierge desk or online through our member portal. Professional instruction is also available.

facilities.question: What water sports equipment is available?
facilities.answer: We provide complimentary snorkel gear, paddle boards, kayaks, and beach equipment. All equipment is included with your stay.

facilities.question: Do you have a spa?
facilities.answer: Yes, we offer spa services by appointment including massages, facials, body treatments, and wellness programs. Advance booking is recommended.

facilities.question: Is there a business center?
facilities.answer: Yes, our business center offers computer access, printing, scanning, fax services, and meeting facilities for business travelers.

location_transport.question: How do I get to CBC from the airport?
location_transport.answer: We can arrange airport transfers for your convenience. Taxis are also available but we recommend pre-arranging transportation through our concierge.

location_transport.question: Can I rent a car in Bermuda?
location_transport.answer: No, private car rentals are not available to tourists in Bermuda. Transportation options include taxis, scooters, public buses, ferries, and bicycles.

location_transport.question: What is the best way to get around Bermuda?
location_transport.answer: For maximum flexibility, scooter rentals are popular. Taxis are convenient but expensive. Public buses and ferries are economical and scenic options.

location_transport.question: Is CBC close to Hamilton or St. George's?
location_transport.answer: CBC is located in Paget Parish on the South Shore. Hamilton is about 10 minutes by taxi, while St. George's is approximately 30 minutes away.

activities.question: What activities are available for children?
activities.answer: We offer seasonal kids' clubs, family beach activities, junior sports instruction, nature programs, and arts & crafts. Age-appropriate activities are planned throughout the year.

activities.question: Can you arrange island tours?
activities.answer: Yes, our concierge can arrange various island tours including historical sites, nature tours, shopping excursions, and cultural experiences.

activities.question: What evening entertainment is available?
activities.answer: Evening activities include cocktail hours, live music nights, wine tastings, cultural lectures, and seasonal themed events in our various venues.

activities.question: Are there golf courses nearby?
activities.answer: Yes, Bermuda has several championship golf courses. Our concierge can arrange tee times and transportation to courses including Mid Ocean Club and Port Royal Golf Course.

membership.question: Can non-members stay at CBC?
membership.answer: Yes, non-members may stay as guests with member approval. Contact our reservations team for availability and booking procedures.

membership.question: How can I become a member?
membership.answer: Membership is by invitation only. Interested parties should contact our membership office for information about the application process and requirements.

membership.question: Do I have access to reciprocal clubs?
membership.answer: Yes, CBC members have access to a global network of reciprocal clubs. A letter of introduction is required and can be arranged through our concierge.

practical.question: What currency is used in Bermuda?
practical.answer: Bermuda uses the Bermuda Dollar (BMD), which is pegged 1:1 with the US Dollar. US currency is widely accepted throughout the island.

practical.question: What should I pack for Bermuda?
practical.answer: Pack light, casual clothing, swimwear, sun protection, comfortable walking shoes, and smart casual attire for dining. Bermuda shorts are traditional formal wear for men.

practical.question: Is tipping expected?
practical.answer: Yes, tipping is customary in Bermuda. 15-20% is standard for restaurants and taxis. Housekeeping and other service staff also appreciate gratuities.

practical.question: What is the weather like year-round?
practical.answer: Bermuda enjoys a subtropical climate. Summer (June-September) is warm and humid (75-85°F), while winter (December-February) is cooler (60-70°F) but still pleasant.

practical.question: Do I need any special documents to visit Bermuda?
practical.answer: US and Canadian citizens need a valid passport. Other nationalities should check visa requirements. No special vaccinations are required.

events_weddings.question: Can CBC host my wedding?
events_weddings.answer: Yes, CBC offers beautiful wedding venues and comprehensive wedding services. Contact our events team to discuss your special day and available packages.

events_weddings.question: What is the capacity for events?
events_weddings.answer: Event capacity varies by venue, from intimate gatherings of 10 to large celebrations of 200+ guests. We can accommodate various event sizes and styles.

events_weddings.question: Do you provide wedding planning services?
events_weddings.answer: Yes, we offer professional wedding coordination services including timeline management, vendor coordination, and day-of wedding management.

events_weddings.question: Are outdoor venues available year-round?
events_weddings.answer: Outdoor venues are available year-round, with indoor backup options for inclement weather. Spring through fall offers the most reliable outdoor weather.

policies.question: What is your cancellation policy?
policies.answer: Cancellation policies vary by season and length of stay. Please refer to your booking confirmation or contact reservations for specific terms.

policies.question: Is smoking allowed on the property?
policies.answer: CBC is a non-smoking property. Designated outdoor smoking areas are available for guests who smoke.

policies.question: What happens if there's bad weather?
policies.answer: Indoor alternatives are available for most activities. Our team will work with you to adjust plans and ensure you have an enjoyable experience regardless of weather.

policies.question: Is there a minimum age for certain facilities?
policies.answer: Most facilities welcome all ages, though some fitness equipment and spa services have age restrictions. Our kids' programs cater to various age groups.
